subject: Boston Marathon Bombings (2013)
Diplomatic Service, Embassies and Consulates
Boston Marathon
lead_paragraph: The champion Ethiopian runner Lelisa Desisa said his “joy turned to sorrow” after the April 15 marathon bombings, and he dedicated his victory to the victims.
snippet: The champion Ethiopian runner Lelisa Desisa said his “joy turned to sorrow” after the April 15 marathon bombings, and he dedicated his victory to the victims.
